message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. Given its exceptional value, I'm starting with a price of $2000000. I believe it's worth every penny, but I'm open to negotiations if you have a different valuation in mind.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the product's worth to me. I'm open to further negotiations if needed.

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. However, considering your budget constraints, I'm willing to make a concession. I can offer the product to you for $1600000. I believe this is a fair price, and I'm open to further negotiations if needed.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the concession you made, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm open to further negotiations if needed.
